body: If I try to conver a .png file in .tif the Honeybee_image_convert component works: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/REo6ZpL7D6OSRT6yxC1T85KEg43RFeh9ZNoXWomeY1m*0cSmqiR6LcDegWwBymlQfP6jNEINUyDmbPsqohTXn-SFpV7GjGdU/1.png) If I try to convert .tif image in .hdr it doesn't work: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/REo6ZpL7D6OwaP0lTht1QoUu2cc5z7EN1VZc6frIq7NpTn2bjkcWvmQstlSwrJZO2-jrzDuFt-zPZX11vE53opzEt83WNwE5/2.png) The error message  reports: "1. Failed to genearate the .gif file. Open the bat file with a text editor and change the last line from exit to pause. Then run it again and see what is the error. here is the file address: ...." If I try to use Honeybee_falsecolor component with an .hdr file it works properly but when I try to convert the output from .hdr in .tif it doesn.t work: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/REo6ZpL7D6MoRWWZXEhXWIjP452Acpq*NO4VoslgTpj27dxoCYAvkyN6k37T0gOpzN2Rk4P0DQNmCYYbcXuE*FCBPbCpphaB/3.png) The error message is the same:" 1. Failed to genearate the .gif file. Open the bat file with a text editor and change the last line from exit to pause. Then run it again and see what is the error. here is the file address: ..." Can you help me to solve this issue?

replies.body: I update this topic with test access: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/b9WdiVqANsm0E4wtVgojiMQ848iSCYEAICdVI*mri9aK3IbHbuJ72wPIr-Rm7Jk978W7caUvm7jFu2AKB8CBi43znwRKCchF/4.JPG)
I have also tried to change the last line from "exit" to "pause".

[with this feedback](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/honey-bee-issue?commentId=2985220%3AComment%3A1413214&groupId=2985220%3AGroup%3A658987) I have changed the folder for the tiff file and it works now.
